Key Match Events: Finn Allen scored 137 runs from 62 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Tim Southee led the Kiwi bowling attack after he scalped two wickets in his four-over spell
Allen was named the 'Player of the Match' after his blitz knock in the first inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand gained an unassailable lead over Pakistan after the end of the third T20I game
Haris Rauf and Afridi conceded 2/60 and 1/43 respectively
Shaheen Afridi (16*) and Mohammad Wasim Jr (1*) were unbeaten on the crease for Pakistan
